game.name: Dner Kebab salade tomates oignons
game.description:
The popular recipe of your popular restaurant is Doner Kebab. People from all across the city come to your restaurant to eat this awesome recipe. Here you love catering the needs of guests with different tastes. Your specialty is to make food as fast as possible and return every customer with a huge smile. Today is a festival and you are supposed to handle a wide range of customer base. Join DÃ¶ner Kebab: Salade, Tomates, Oignons and be prepared to take control of an awesome restaurant!

Your objective in this brand new girls game is to prepare a maximum of meal as fast as you can and make sure that you fulfill the demands and needs of every customer. Start with taking your first order and completing it before time runs out! When you finish the prescribed food items, you are allowed to move to the advanced level. Challenge your cooking skills and sharp reflexes to manage your doner restaurant and serve as many orders as possible based on the requests of your customers!

Hey girls! You are the boss of a renowned restaurant and do not to forget to apply your management abilities to complete each level with 3 stars rating. Be careful and try to prepare as much meal as you can for your clients using all the ingredients shown on the screen! Grab stars by completing each level and upgrade the menu of your restaurant using those starts in this HTML5 cooking game! Good luck to become the king of kebab by finishing all 100 levels and collecting all 300 stars! Have fun without download!
